definition: illustration/diagram/graphical representation/to explain with the aid of a diagram
diagram/picture/drawing/chart/map/CL:張|张[zhang1]/to plan/to scheme/to attempt/to pursue/to seek
acrobatic display (esp. on horseback) (old)/variant of 懈[xie4] and 邂[xie4] (old)
to divide/to break up/to split/to separate/to dissolve/to solve/to melt/to remove/to untie/to loosen/to open/to emancipate/to explain/to understand/to know/a solution/a dissection

sentences.english: This is a graphic of a typical reactor.
sentences.chinese: 这是一个典型的反应堆的图解。

sentences.english: Dehn himself was a particularly enthusiastic advocate of group diagrams.
sentences.chinese: 戴恩本人就特别热衷的群图解的倡导者。

sentences.english: The diagrams above indicate some connection with tessellations.
sentences.chinese: 上述各个图解表明了与分格的某种联系。

sentences.english: The Graphic Methodintroduced in the paper is easy for students to master.
sentences.chinese: 用本文叙述的图解法作剪力图和弯矩图学生易于掌握。

sentences.english: Each hill of the diagram building represents a mega-city.
sentences.chinese: 图解建筑体上的每座山头代表一座超大城市。
他给一种新电脑做图解。

sentences.english: We also scheme out a diagram showing relationship between two stridulatory file types.
sentences.chinese: 对潜蝇科内两类音锉型的关系作了图解。

sentences.english: This graphical technique is particularly applicable to high-relief structures.
sentences.chinese: 图解方法特别适用于起伏大的构造。

sentences.english: We have pleasure in enclosing a copy of our illustrated catalogue and price list.
sentences.chinese: 很高兴随附一份我方的图解目录和价目单。

sentences.english: Besides, the theoretical stages of extraction and distillation columns of this two solvents are compared by graphic method.
sentences.chinese: 用图解法比较萃取塔及蒸馏塔的理论级数。

sentences.english: This paper has presented a graphic designing method for the tubular fairies knitted on double needle bar warp knitting machine.
sentences.chinese: 本文提出圆筒双针床经编组织的图解设计方法。

sentences.english: To end it, the graphic method and analytic method to reconstruct the original shape of an axonometric stereo projection have been given.
sentences.chinese: 给出了轴测体视投影复原的图解法和解析法。

sentences.english: An example is properly given to explain the correct use of the homographs.
sentences.chinese: 文中还举例说明了图解的使用方法。

sentences.english: Latin and Chinese descriptions and illustrations are given for the new species.
sentences.chinese: 对新种作了拉丁文及汉文描述和图解。

sentences.english: A diagrammatic method is employed to compute shock absorber force at compression stroke.
sentences.chinese: 提出了计算压缩行程减振器阻力的图解法。

sentences.english: These ideas are summarized in a diagram reproduced from Wain and Fawcett.
sentences.chinese: 这些见解归纳在从韦恩和福西特复制的一个图解上。

definition: to explain in detail/detailed answer/full solution (to a math problem)
course of study/teaching module at university/tutorial
mnemonic chant/rhyme for remembering (arithmetic tables, character stroke order etc)
the key trick/the secret of success
France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])
